oai_dc:dc.dc:title: TWA Skyclub in the Clouds
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “TWA Skyclub in the Clouds - Color-foto by TWA, The Transcontinental Airline” TWA airplane in the sky, color image.

“TWA planes flying The Transcontinental Airline link, vital production centers from coast to coast, speeding the movement of essential wartime passengers and cargo. [typed/pre-printed] -- Donation by the estate of Mrs. Georgia Louise Price
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: TWA; airplanes; airlines; Transcontinental Airline;
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Color-foto by TWA, The Transcontinental Airline; Collection processed by Angela Price
